channel.title: Unidata Science Gateway News

li.a: 12/07/2021, Unidata Science Gateway at AGU and AMS
9/17/2021, Unidata Science Gateway Presentation at eScience 2021

item.title: Unidata Science Gateway at AGU and AMS
item.author: chastang at ucar dot edu (Julien Chastang)
item.description: During the months of December and January there will be two presentations that touch upon the Unidata Science Gateway. There will be a lightning talk entitled "The use of the Unidata Science Gateway as a cyberinfrastructure resource to facilitate education and research during COVID-19" at the American Geophysical Union Fall 2021 meeting. In January there will be a talk called "Unidata Partners with UCAR SOARS Program to Help Protégés and Their Mentors with Atmospheric Science Internships" at the American Meteorological Society's 2022 winter meeting.

item.title: Unidata Community Survey
item.author: chastang at ucar dot edu (Julien Chastang)
item.description: Make your voice heard on Unidata Science Gateway offerings. Please partake in the Unidata Community Survey.

item.title: Unidata Science Gateway Presentation at eScience 2021
item.author: chastang at ucar dot edu (Julien Chastang)
item.description: The presentation will be given as part of the 17th IEEE eScience 2021 International Conference. The talk is part of the Technical Program and will be delivered on Wednesday, September 22nd at 15:30-1600 CEST.
